markdownRemark.html: Located in Adra, in the Province of Almeria. It has the following services - tennis courts, padel courts, table tennis room, squash room, football field, a children's playground and much more. There is also disabled access, an outdoor pool, restaurant, cafeteria, gym and a sauna.
